dis.so.ci.ate

[dIsosIˌєt, -soʃI-; diˋsouʃiєit, -ˋsousi-]

及物动词
1 把…[从…]拉开,分开; 使… 分离,
把… 分开来想[from]
(←→associate)
It is impossible to ~ language from culture.
语言与文化是不能隔的
2 [~ oneself]断绝关系[from]
I want to ~ myself from my companions.
我想要与我的同伴断绝关系
I ~ myself from everything he has said.
我和他所说的一切无关
